itemDescription: English female Rabbi and member of the British House of Lords

wikipedia_page.main: Julia Babette Sarah Neuberger, Baroness Neuberger,  (née Schwab; born 27 February 1950) is a British member of the House of Lords and former rabbi. She previously took the Liberal Democrat whip, but resigned from the party and became a crossbencher in 2011 upon becoming the full-time senior rabbi of the West London Synagogue, from which she retired in 2020. She became the chair of University College London Hospitals (UCLH) in 2019.

response: * Rabbi Julia Neuberger, Baroness Neuberger (born 1950), former Senior Rabbi at West London Synagogue
